org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor.sensors

类 SensorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.model.sensor.sensors.SensorModel
  • 直接已知子类:
    AccelerometerModel, BarcodeReaderModel, GravityModel, GyroscopeModel, LightModel, LinearAccelerationModel, MagneticFieldModel, OrientationModel, PressureModel, ProximityModel, RotationVectorModel, TemperatureModel

    public abstract class SensorModel
extends java.lang.Object
    SensorModel keeps the internal data model behind a Sensor, common to all sensors. It also contains abstract methods for sensor specific actions (that must be implemented for each sensor).
    作者:
    ilarele

      • getSafeDouble

        public double getSafeDouble(javax.swing.JTextField textfield)

      • getSafeDouble

        public double getSafeDouble(javax.swing.JTextField textfield,
                            double defaultValue)
        Safely retries the double value of a text field. If the value is not a valid number, 0 is returned, and the field is marked red.
        参数:
        textfield - TextField from which the value should be read.
        defaultValue - default value if input field is invalid.
        返回:
        double value.

      • getSafeDoubleList

        public static double[] getSafeDoubleList(javax.swing.JTextField textfield)
        Safely retries the a list of double values of a text field. If the list contains errors, null is returned, and the field is marked red.
        参数:
        textfield - TextField from which the value should be read.
        返回:
        list double[] with values or null.
